name: Peckish Snacks
description: Healthy Snacks Delivered To Your Desk
overview:
Peckish helps over 100 million Americans lead a healthier and more productive lifestyle by delivering healthy and nutrient-rich snacks directly to their desk.

Studies show that eating every 2-3 hours and maintaining adequate nutrition can raise people’s productivity levels by 20% on average.

Peckish is the new way to healthy eating at work and the most convenient way for busy working professionals to maintain their energy level and stay engaged throughout the day.

Our mission is to work with nutritionists and search for a wide variety of quality, delicious and nutritious snacks from around the world.

• Every week, Peckish delivers boxes of healthy snacks to corporate offices where our customers work at.

• We make eating at work healthy, convenient and affordable.
